content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 1, Real Madrid 2.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 1, Real Madrid 2.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Pepe.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Raphael Varane replaces Karim Benzema.
Neymar (Barcelona) hits the right post with a right footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Xavi with a through ball.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Casemiro replaces Isco.
Xabi Alonso (Real Madrid) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Xabi Alonso (Real Madrid).
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Gareth Bale.
Substitution, Barcelona. Alexis Sánchez replaces Marc Bartra.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Asier Illarramendi replaces Ángel Di María.
Goal!  Barcelona 1, Real Madrid 2. Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Fábio Coentrão.
Attempt saved. Adriano (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Neymar.
Attempt missed. Ángel Di María (Real Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Karim Benzema following a fast break.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Pepe.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Pepe.
Luka Modric (Real Madrid) hits the left post with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Ángel Di María.
Offside, Barcelona. Xavi tries a through ball, but Neymar is caught offside.
Offside, Barcelona. Xavi tries a through ball, but Lionel Messi is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Dani Alves (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Andrés Iniesta.
Hand ball by Pedro (Barcelona).
Attempt saved. Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Isco.
Attempt blocked. Luka Modric (Real Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Karim Benzema.
Goal!  Barcelona 1, Real Madrid 1. Marc Bartra (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Xavi with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Daniel Carvajal.
Pinto (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gareth Bale (Real Madrid).
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Pinto.
Attempt saved. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ángel Di María.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Iker Casillas.
Attempt saved. Marc Bartra (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Sergio Busquets.
Fábio Coentrão (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Pedro (Barcelona).
Attempt missed. Xabi Alonso (Real Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Isco following a corner.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Marc Bartra.
Attempt blocked. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt saved. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Luka Modric with a cross.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Javier Mascherano.
Substitution, Barcelona. Pedro replaces Cesc Fàbregas.
Offside, Barcelona. Cesc Fàbregas tries a through ball, but Lionel Messi is caught offside.
Hand ball by Isco (Real Madrid).
Offside, Real Madrid. Ángel Di María tries a through ball, but Karim Benzema is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the centre of the box is just a bit too high following a set piece situation.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Pepe (Real Madrid) because of an injury.
Javier Mascherano (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Pepe (Real Madrid) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Barcelona).
Attempt missed. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
Foul by Pepe (Real Madrid).
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Daniel Carvajal.
Offside, Barcelona. Javier Mascherano tries a through ball, but Neymar is caught offside.
Substitution, Barcelona. Adriano replaces Jordi Alba because of an injury.
Second Half begins Barcelona 0, Real Madrid 1.
First Half ends, Barcelona 0, Real Madrid 1.
Attempt missed. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Ángel Di María with a cross.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Neymar.

Pepe (Real Madrid) is shown the yellow card.
Neymar (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card.

Goal!  Barcelona 0, Real Madrid 1. Ángel Di María (Real Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Karim Benzema with a through ball following a fast break.
Foul by Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona).
Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Javier Mascherano.
Attempt blocked. Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Isco.

Isco (Real Madrid) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
